templates.name: Standard P&L (Income Statement)
templates.description: Standard profit and loss statement structure suitable for most businesses. Includes revenue, COGS, gross profit, operating expenses, and net income.

templates.name: Standard Balance Sheet
templates.description: Standard balance sheet structure with assets, liabilities, and equity sections. Includes current/non-current classifications.

templates.name: Oil & Gas Lease Operating Statement
templates.description: Lease Operating Statement (LOS) for upstream oil & gas operations. Includes revenue by product, LOE categories, and netback calculations.

templates.name: Upstream Oil & Gas P&L
templates.description: Comprehensive income statement for E&P (Exploration & Production) companies. Includes revenue by product type, LOE breakdown, DD&A, and proved reserve metrics.

templates.name: Midstream Oil & Gas P&L
templates.description: Income statement for midstream oil & gas companies (gathering, processing, transportation, storage). Includes fee-based and commodity revenue, throughput metrics, and DCF calculations.

templates.name: Oilfield Services Company P&L
templates.description: Income statement for oilfield services companies (drilling, completions, pressure pumping, wireline). Includes service line revenue, equipment utilization, and crew metrics.

templates.name: Industrial Manufacturing P&L
templates.description: Income statement for industrial manufacturing companies. Includes detailed COGS breakdown, manufacturing variances, and plant-level profitability.

templates.name: Industrial Services Company P&L
templates.description: Income statement for industrial services companies (maintenance, equipment services, facility services). Includes labor-intensive service delivery with project-based and contract revenue.

templates.name: SaaS Company P&L
templates.description: Income statement for SaaS (Software as a Service) companies. Organized by SaaS metrics with ARR/MRR tracking, subscription revenue, and customer success costs.

templates.name: Transportation & Logistics P&L
templates.description: Income statement for transportation and logistics companies (trucking, freight, 3PL). Includes revenue by service type, fleet costs, and key transportation metrics.

templates.name: Geographic Hierarchy
templates.description: Multi-level geographic hierarchy for organizing data by global regions, countries, states/provinces, and cities. Useful for sales territories and regional reporting.

templates.name: Organizational Department Hierarchy
templates.description: Standard organizational department hierarchy for reporting by business function. Covers executive, operations, sales, finance, HR, IT, and support functions.

templates.name: Asset Class Hierarchy
templates.description: Asset classification hierarchy for fixed asset management, depreciation reporting, and capital planning. Covers property, equipment, vehicles, IT assets, and intangibles.

templates.name: Legal Entity Hierarchy
templates.description: Legal entity structure for consolidation, intercompany eliminations, and statutory reporting. Tracks parent-subsidiary relationships and ownership structure.

templates.name: Upstream Oil & Gas Field Hierarchy
templates.description: Geographic and operational hierarchy for upstream E&P operations. Organizes production by basin, area, field, and well. Supports rollup of production volumes, LOE, and capital.

templates.name: Midstream Oil & Gas Asset Hierarchy
templates.description: Asset hierarchy for midstream infrastructure including gathering systems, processing plants, pipelines, and storage facilities. Supports throughput and utilization tracking.

templates.name: Manufacturing Plant Hierarchy
templates.description: Operational hierarchy for manufacturing companies organizing production by region, plant, production line, and work center. Supports capacity planning and production reporting.

templates.name: Fleet & Route Hierarchy
templates.description: Operational hierarchy for transportation companies organizing fleet assets by type, location, and route network. Supports capacity planning and utilization tracking.

templates.name: Cost Center Hierarchy
templates.description: Cost center hierarchy for expense allocation and responsibility accounting. Organizes costs by organizational responsibility with rollup to department and corporate levels.

templates.name: Profit Center Hierarchy
templates.description: Profit center hierarchy for profitability analysis and revenue/cost allocation. Tracks P&L by business segment, product line, or market.

accounting.name: Accounting
accounting.description: Chart of accounts, GL structures, and statutory reporting hierarchies

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Cost centers, profit centers, budgeting, and management reporting hierarchies

operations.name: Operations
operations.description: Geographic, departmental, asset, and organizational hierarchies

general.name: General
general.description: Industry-agnostic templates suitable for most businesses

oil_gas.description: Templates for oil and gas industry (general)

industrial_services.description: Industrial maintenance, facility services, equipment services
